communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Mahmoud Khalil detention file
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The detention files of Mahmoud Khalil, including disciplinary records, strip search forms and other documents such as staff reports about the individual’s behavior.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dillon Bergin

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: ICE Air Operations
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Regarding ICE Air Operations from February 1, 2025 until the date this request is ultimately fulfilled: 
- All ICE summaries, reports, logs and records regarding domestic flights to transport detainees 
- Documents containing information on what ground transportation is used to transfer detainees to airports

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dillon Bergin

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Mahmoud Khalil correspondence
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all correspondence, memos, letters and/or reports, including all underlying attachments contained therein, sent to, from or cc'd Todd Lyons OR Madison Sheahan OR Jon Feere OR Kenneth Genalo OR Adam V. Loiacono AND from February 1, 2025 until the date this request is ultimately fulfilled containing any of the following non-case-sensitive-key-strings: “khalil" OR "mahmoud".

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dillon Bergin

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Student visa correspondence
communications.communication: To clarify, I mean any of the following non-case-sensitive-key-strings: “rumeysa" OR "ozturk", without a period after ozturk.

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Student visa correspondence
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all correspondence, memos, letters and/or reports, including all underlying attachments contained therein, sent to, from or cc'd Todd Lyons OR Madison Sheahan OR Jon Feere OR Kenneth Genalo OR Adam V. Loiacono AND any email with the @state.gov domain from February 1, 2025 until the date this request is ultimately fulfilled containing any of the following non-case-sensitive-key-strings: “hamas", "student", "students" OR "visa".

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Dillon Bergin

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: CVES capital projects
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any of the following documents submitted by Champlain Valley Educational Services (CVES), BEDS Code: 099000000000, to the NYSED Office of Facilities Planning from January 1, 1980, through March 28, 2025:

#1 - Letters of Intent (LOIs) / PRELIMINARY SUBMISSIONS: All LOIs submitted by CVES for proposed capital projects during this time period. These records should include:
  - The full text of each Letter of Intent.
  - Any associated documents or attachments submitted alongside the LOIs.

#2 - Certificates of Substantial Completion: All Certificates of Substantial Completion submitted by CVES for capital projects completed during this time period. These records should include:
  - The full text of each certificate.
  - Documentation confirming project completion dates.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

y10n
